oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Snodgrass House, Thomas' Headquarters at Chickamauga
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of the Snodgrass House at Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. There are three cannons positioned in front of the house. Features a white border with an undivided back and handwriting on both sides. August 4, 1906 postmark. [No. 6304]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga Battlefield (Ga.); Chickamauga (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Log cabins; Trees; Cannons
